cn.title: 关于支持 ZEC（Zcash）分叉币 Ycash 的公告

message.data: 比特派暂定将支持 ZEC（Zcash）的分叉币 Ycash，并将于区块高度 570,000 进行快照（预计2019年07月18日）。
据YCASH社区消息，届时钱包内的 ZEC 持币者将获得1:1数量的Ycash代币，分叉币发放将以社区最后的规则为准。
为了您的资产安全，分叉期间请避免收发行为。

en.title: Announcement on Supporting ZEC (Zcash) Fork Coin Ycash

message.data: Bitpie wallet is tentatively scheduled to support ZEC (Zcash)'s forked coin Ycash and will take a snapshot at the block height of 570,000 (expected time July 18, 2019).

According to the YCASH community news, the ZEC holders in the wallet will receive a 1:1 quantity of Ycash tokens. The distribution of the fork coin will be subject to the final rules of the community.
For your asset security, please avoid sending and receiving during the fork.
